summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to learn more about their service plans and downgrade their current plan. The agent provided the customer with information about the various plans available, including data speeds, additional benefits, and pricing. The customer chose a 4G LTE plan that included unlimited talk, text, and data plus 10GB of high-speed data each month as well as discounts on accessories and device protection plans. The agent also confirmed that the customer could keep their current phone number when switching plans.
